item.description:
We're going to have a happy hour together in Hartford and have some drinks. The location is Savin Rock Roasting Company, click the link below to check it out:

http://savinrockroast...

We'll arrive at 6pm and mingle for a while, afterward we may visit some other nearby venues like Trumbull Kitchen or Sally's.

Hartford Young Professionals and Entrepreneurs (HYPE) is having a get together at Savin Rock also that night so we'll be mingling with some of them to. If you have a business card go ahead and bring it, it'll be a good opportunity to network for you.

Dress nicely and let's have a nice evening.


HYPE's link: http://www.metrohartf...
item.name: Happy Hour at Savin Rock Roasting Company
